public class Substituter
extends Object
implements ValueMaker, MatchMaker
The default -- and simplest -- of the quasi parsers

matchBind(Object, Object)
As a quasi-pattern, "first" replace all ${i}s with args[i]s, then see if the speciman matches the pattern.

Evaluate as a quasi-literal by replacing ${i} with args[i], for all i

matchBind 
 public Object[] matchBind(Object args,
                           Object specimen)
As a quasi-pattern, "first" replace all ${i}s with args[i]s, then see if the speciman matches the pattern. If not, return null. If so, return an array in which the i'th element is the part of the specimen that matched @{i}.

matchBind 
 public boolean matchBind(Object args,
                          Object specimen,
                          Vector bindings)
